title: The Omega Squad Veigar Skin is so Pay to Lose
body: It makes your W hit box easier to see, please make it so only your team can see the R E D cross-hair riot. It would make sense in real life as well.

replies.body:
Personally, im a fan of 'clarity' as riot puts it.

The skill in league should come from outplaying your opponent, by seeing their spells and avoiding/negating them and using your own.
it shouldn't come from the fact that your ability was just harder to see and more visually confusing than theirs and so they didnt realise that they were still in danger.

Veigar is a very old champion, and I'm sure that were he be made today, his W would have a clear visual indicator around it on all his skins _(much like Zac's Elastic Slingshot)_

I think i speak for many people when I say that if you have to die, its better to die knowing how and why you were outplayed, than just to sit there thinking _"I don't know what happened? that didn't even hit me."_

So I personally would argue the opposite, that the Omega skin is how it should be, and the other skins are wrong.
Then make a hitbox indicator for all his skins, doesn't matter either way just get rid of the disadvantage this skin has.
